message.entry: Expected MaxSize to be less than [{0} {1}], which is the ROI size.
Expected MaxSize to be less than [{0} {1}], which is the image size.
Height and width of the input must be greater than 1 for {0}.
'Normalization' in the image input layer must be 'none'.
Input network must have convolution layer.
The input image must be gray scale or RGB.
The NormalizationStatistics structure must contain the following fields: Mean and StandardDeviation.
The 'Mean' and 'StandardDeviation' field values of the NormalizationStatistics structure must be a vector of size [1 {0}].
Input numeric data cannot have more than 4 dimensions.
Images must have the same size when the MiniBatchSize value is greater than 1. To detect objects in images of varying size, set the MiniBatchSize value to 1.
MaxSize value must be greater than MinSize value.
The size of the input ROI, {0}, must be greater than ''MinSize'', {1}.
The size of the input image, {0}, must be greater than the ''MinSize'', {1}.
Input image datatype must be uint8, uint16, int16, double, single or gpuArray.
ROI input is not supported when AutoResize is set to false.
ROI input must be a row array with 4 elements.
Code generation does not support the argument ''{1}'' passed to ''{0}'' method. This argument will be ignored.
For code generation, input channel size and batch size to {0} detect method must be fixed.
